channel.title: PDF Security
channel.description: I have a couple pdf security questions. How can I disable the "Save a Copy" button? I have Acrobat 7.0 Pro. How can I implement JS in the pdf file? On my apache webserver, how can I put it in a protected folder and still allow access through an iframe?

item.title: PDF Security
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

I have a couple pdf security questions.
How can I disable the “Save a Copy” button? I have Acrobat 7.0 Pro.
How can I implement JS in the pdf file?
On my apache webserver, how can I put it in a protected folder and still allow access through an iframe?

Read full topic
